name: Penka - Predict futbol
description:
Download Penka now, share it with your friends and have fun predicting the results of the best tournaments in the world.

PLAY DIFFERENT GAME MODES


TOURNAMENTS
Predict the result from beginning until the end of the best tournaments


COMBOS
Group of games gathered together by the Penka team.


MIX OF MATCHES
Create your Penka based on the matches you want



CREATE:
Create for free Penka of 20+ different tournaments
Invite as many friends as you want
Your rules: prize, participants, etc.
Exclusive dashboard for creators in order to manage the Penka
Send messages to the participants when you want.

PLAY:

Join the Penka of your friends in a single click
Predict the results up to 3 minutes before each match
Follow the results live
Check your friends' predictions and positions instantly
